name: TT left
func:
from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
GPIO.setwarnings(False)

with open("/home/pi/shared/log/pin_turntable_step.log", "r") as file:
    STEP=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared/log/pin_turntable_dir.log", "r") as file:
    DIR=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared/log/turntable_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    step_count=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared/log/turntable_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delay=float(file.read())

step_count=step_count/36

GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DIR, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(STEP, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(DIR, 0)

for x in range(step_count):
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.HIGH)
    sleep(delay)
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(delay)
GPIO.cleanup()

return msg

func:
from time import sleep
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
GPIO.setwarnings(False)

with open("/home/pi/shared/log/pin_turntable_step.log", "r") as file:
    STEP=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared/log/pin_turntable_dir.log", "r") as file:
    DIR=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared/log/turntable_stepsperrotation.log", "r") as file:
    step_count=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared/log/turntable_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delay=float(file.read())

step_count=step_count/36

GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DIR, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(STEP, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(DIR, 1)

for x in range(step_count):
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.HIGH)
    sleep(delay)
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(delay)
GPIO.cleanup()

return msg

from time import sleep

    step_count=int(file.read())
with open("/home/pi/shared/log/rotor_delay.log", "r") as file:
    delay=float(file.read())

step_count=step_count/72

GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(DIR, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.setup(STEP, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(DIR, 0)

for x in range(step_count):
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.HIGH)
    sleep(delay)
    GPIO.output(STEP, GPIO.LOW)
    sleep(delay)
GPIO.cleanup()

return msg
